name: Alameda County Housing Authority (HACA)
description: Section 8 housing vouchers for Alameda County residents (excluding Oakland)
fullDescription: The Housing Authority of the County of Alameda administers Section 8 vouchers and affordable housing programs for low-income residents throughout Alameda County.
whatTheyOffer:
- Section 8 Housing Choice Vouchers
- Project-based voucher programs
- Special vouchers for homeless veterans (VASH)
- Family self-sufficiency program
- Moderate rehabilitation program
howToGetIt:
1. Check HACA website for waitlist status
2. Apply when waitlist opens
3. Must meet income limits (50% area median income)
4. Waitlist serves cities outside Oakland
5. Oakland has separate housing authority
keywords: HACA, Alameda County Housing Authority, Section 8, housing voucher, public housing, Oakland, East Bay, low-income, waitlist
